commands.command: SELECT table_schema,table_name, column_name, data_type + isnull('(' + cast( character_maximum_length as varchar) + ')', '') type , CASE IS_NULLABLE WHEN 'no' then ' NOT NULL' ELSE '' END data_type, NUMERIC_PRECISION,NUMERIC_SCALE, column_default 'default' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns WHERE column_name like '%price%'--table_name= 'contractor' and data_type ='decimal' ORDER BY 2, ordinal_position
